name: session-end-verification
description: Run lint check and build verification in the background when a Claude Code session ends. Part of the Solo Founder SDLC Kit.
author: fcojaviergon

hooks.command: bash -c '( npx @biomejs/biome check ./src --no-errors-on-unmatched > /tmp/biome-report.txt 2>&1; npm run build --if-present > /tmp/build-report.txt 2>&1 || true; echo "$(date +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S) STOP" >> ~/.claude/session-log.txt ) &'
